name: Alec Bradley - 1600 Brazilian - Robusto
additionalNotes: Alec Bradley 1600 cigars continue AB's award-winning rep for producing premium cigars with superb quality, flavor and balance. Their numerical moniker comes from the year 1600, when tobacco was first grown in Brazil, and the source of their dark, lustrous Habano wrappers. When added to the Honduran, Nicaraguan & Costa Rican filler core, they reveal a full-bodied smoke rippling with flavors of earth, wood, some sweetness, and a spicy aroma.Â
